page.title: 08Youth Activities
page.content: In our survey of the area,we found that one of the biggest complaints was the lack of activities and facilities for young people.The nearest Sports Hall/Swimming Bath is in Cheadle, and the nearest cinema is in Uttoxeter. There are, however, two Brownie Packs and two Guide Companies all of which meet in St Thomas'R.C. School.The boys have to go into Cheadle for Cubs and Scouts. There are two football teams for boys in Tean and the Cricket Club does have a boys' section. Occasionaly Discos and Social evenings for Teenagers are held in Tean Village Hall,but they are not regular events.
